Reviews.Title: “Comfortable boutique hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: Dave201253
Reviews.Content: stayed nights wife march 2012 initially chose location proximity eurostar gare du nord short 10 minute stroll metro cadet 5 minutes paris doorstep plenty walking opera shops bvd hausmann time gentle morning stroll found montmartre lovely views paris hotel service owing wide variety local eating options breakfast costs extra feed croissants rolls fruits juice cheese etc staff friendly appreciative french speak english fine free wifi tearing hair times connections continually dropping ground floor purposes clean bed comfortable mini bar available french tv wet shower excellent real pleasure ive stayed hotels shower disappointment dribbling water sometimes hot sometimes cold hotel de la tour helped trip paris enjoyable experience recommend

Reviews.Title: “Delightful Paris boutique hotel with 5 Star service!”
Reviews.Author: Duchysue
Reviews.Content: booked bargain break via eurostar gare du nord wonder sort hotel bargain price delighted hotel de la tour super hotel quiet street friendly helpful staff limited french furnished warm hot window bonus fabulous generous continental breakfast juice fruit yogurt plus mini pastries lovely butter jams wonderful coffee avoid tea unless own teabags kept til mid afternoon saved cost meal day paris pretty expensive anyway plus beds comfortable shower powerful efficient shower roomtoilet huge priority budget break local facilities wonderful cafes typically french food shops enjoy worry weight walking distance beautiful sacre coeur fantastic views paris lopera main sights indeed perfect stay

Reviews.Title: “Easy access for Paris”
Reviews.Author: snabelabel
Reviews.Content: brothers stayed hotel january 2012 found tripadvisor chose hotel rer charles de gaule arrives gare de nord 6 min walking distance station line 7 runs below hotel access centre short amount time hotel interior design modern stylish hotel breakfast buffet served plate cheese yoghurt pancake bread croissants jam juice coffee instead buffet recommend breakfast staff friendly helpful able store luggage leaving day hope ill return paris soon id consider staying tour

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel, kind staff”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights staff helpful hotel situated walking distance gare du nord montmartre metro stations paris feet modern clean breakfast feast fresh croissants fruit salad fruit juice etc prices real deal

Reviews.Title: “Stylish and genuine Paris location”

Reviews.Content: stayed night london stylish boutique hotel paris nord station opted larger premium exquisite interior design cool service friendly helpful downside ground floor facing street

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Drsquid
Reviews.Content: cant fault hotel definitely stay am town hotel road beautiful decor inside thoughtfully decorated position 10 mins gare du nord 5 mins nearest metro pink line goes straight la fayette city centre de louvre change free safe secure baggage storage check sacre coure 10 mins walk hotel quiet romantic beautiful decor lcd tv option english language system decent toiletries preferred own bathrrom shower handy theres hairdryer closet stayed 4 nights lift suprise paris building loved fantastic mattress comfortable winter hot perfect warmth breakfast lasts till 2 pm 9 am crepes yoghurt option hot chocolate tea fresh coffee beautifully staff marvellous isabelle lovely smiling helpful definitely contacted via email trouble thank attentive service dont theres downside nearby theres lots eatery pharmacy etc centre paris metro 10 mins ride metro walked hotel seine 35 50 mins overall highly recommended oh wifi crap cares paris spend time looking round fumbling wifi telling half world crap connection

Reviews.Title: “5 Star treatment”

Reviews.Content: wonderful stay hotel lady runs friendly relaxed perfect hostess decoration standard clean setting charming breakfasting treat sat communal table equally bit privacy own table coffee morning brought tray containing coffee accompanied glass water plateful cream die complain fabulous experience

Reviews.Title: “No big complaints”
Reviews.Author: Senateguy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights week november booked hotwire rate hotel isnt city center short walk metro pretty lady runs isnt friendliest lady town doesnt americans hotel clean efficient day thats cared stayed 51 fifth floor twin beds size french standards bathroom pretty nice hotel kept clean quiet hotel grocery store corner convenient towners buy water soda snacks gard de nord tran station close five blocks cab train station arrived actually walked luggage left closet metro stop cadet stop blocks hotel stop line runs downtown louve main city centre trip paris hotel rate probably stay town left bank champs major complaints stay probably price paid 125 night hotwire hostess nice bring bags hotel prior checkin time leave day checked flight didnt leave evening owner lot smiled little

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Yiannakis81
Reviews.Content: searching hours online nice hotel paris value found booked hotel happy choice met expectations location convenient nice neighborhood service professional friendly spacious clean french style classic modern time definitely recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “70th Birthday Trip”
Reviews.Author: Surreytripper_11
Reviews.Content: booked via couples celebrating 70th birthday hotel met expectations comfortable welcoming clean location excellent sightseeing shopping attractions 1520 minute restaurants similar distance cover tastes staff extremely helpful cheerful suggestions travel bus metro taxis requested special outings promptly arrived time breakfast sufficient day underway plenty coffee hotel definitely helped birthday weekend success

Reviews.Title: “Great little Paris Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Leelee_813
Reviews.Content: little hotel near garde du nord train station stayed 4 nights pleasantly surprised cleanliness service price receptionist helpful pleasure complaint cut bedroom staring directly shower toilet bathroom yes bathroom faint heart newly coupled french romantic

Reviews.Title: “Memorable stay! Woudl love to return!”

Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay hotel la tour opera parents little sister 10years surprised experiences travelers read lot reviews tripadvisors booking hotel prepared paris hotel surpassed expectations spacious comfortable hotel lovely charming receptionist extremely helpful friendly love minibar conception hotel feel home highly recommended
